alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hidalgo County through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Villa Verde, or near Progreso, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Progreso, Progreso City Offices, Progreso High School, Progreso Lakes, Progreso International Bridge, Moon Lake and Lion Lake. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 798 and 806. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
